prompt:
You are an expert music video director analyzing song lyrics to select the most cinematic scenes.

SONG INFORMATION:
- Title: Easy Kill
- Artist: Rio
- Genre: Hip Hop/Rap

TRANSCRIPT SEGMENTS:
Segment 0: 0.0s-6.6s:  Line them up, that's a easy kill I'm a real ghetto boy, I build peasy steel
Segment 1: 6.6s-11.2s:  I ain't touch the trigger, but I seen the drill Your career ain't promising, you probably
Segment 2: 11.2s-13.8s:  need a will Seen a nigga with his head gone and I can
Segment 3: 13.8s-16.4s:  see him still I swear to God that nigga, she was stuck to
Segment 4: 16.4s-18.9s:  the steering wheel Ten footers fit from five years ago
Segment 5: 18.9s-21.6s:  I'ma wear his skin I put that on my kids, I get in that gym,
Segment 6: 21.6s-25.3s:  I can't never tell That's why I gotta watch how I move
Segment 7: 25.3s-27.8s:  Move right, cause if I get some time, then I gotta do it
Segment 8: 27.8s-30.4s:  Don't get out of free, jail curt, it's not Monopoly
Segment 9: 30.4s-33.2s:  I'm down four racks and I ain't do shit but go out to eat
Segment 10: 33.2s-35.7s:  Scope on, he hit a nigga in his dome from down the street
Segment 11: 35.7s-38.6s:  This shit so strong, I'm 23 or both, so why you lie to me?
Segment 12: 38.6s-40.8s:  You ever got hit from a bitch and then you gotta
Segment 13: 40.8s-43.6s:  I heard she had the best pussy in Flint, you know I gotta see
Segment 14: 43.6s-46.9s:  Of course I got cash with me, but I'm not with C
Segment 15: 46.9s-52.6s:  Cash with me, so we play the BPSUV Before I go back broke, I sell some weed
Segment 16: 52.6s-55.6s:  It's been so long since I smelled the seed, like
Segment 17: 55.6s-57.1s:  Where the fuck the real bud at?
Segment 18: 57.1s-60.0s:  Don't get too close, we got a fucking Draco in the club, Jack
Segment 19: 60.0s-62.2s:  Buy a pint of Axe for 20 racks, then take the dub back
Segment 20: 62.2s-65.9s:  I need 30 racks for the fucking show, and where the club at?
Segment 21: 65.9s-68.1s:  Damn, you bad as fuck, where my hug at?
Segment 22: 68.1s-71.6s:  We still got the nigga Pipe, he want his gun back
Segment 23: 71.6s-73.2s:  Do you wanna hear a fun fact?
Segment 24: 73.2s-76.8s:  I really made some motherfucking M's and I ain't do number rap
Segment 25: 76.8s-78.4s:  You ever had five M's at once?
Segment 26: 78.4s-81.6s:  Okay, you didn't, so you won't understand why I don't give a fuck
Segment 27: 81.6s-84.2s:  Money is not everything, J be ripping dubs
Segment 28: 84.2s-86.6s:  They shot the crib up so bad, fucked the kitchen up
Segment 29: 86.6s-89.4s:  Blew the kitchen up, you know the stove's gas
Segment 30: 89.4s-92.0s:  You better leave my white ends alone with your old ass
Segment 31: 92.0s-94.6s:  You ain't want your car to get shot up, you shouldn't have rolled past
Segment 32: 94.6s-97.2s:  I walked out the bank with a smile in a stow bag
Segment 33: 97.2s-100.0s:  I sent her to the bank on a plane, and she drove back
Segment 34: 100.0s-102.5s:  I took the bitch's neck, she want her throat back
Segment 35: 102.5s-105.2s:  Ironic how he never left the house, but bring the dope back
Segment 36: 105.2s-108.2s:  When I catch up with them boys, they get in a closed casket
Segment 37: 108.2s-110.5s:  Matter of fact, they need four caskets
Segment 38: 110.5s-113.5s:  I think my white boy, he working with the feds, he just bought four baskets
Segment 39: 113.5s-115.9s:  He ain't never bought more than a gram
Segment 40: 115.9s-118.6s:  Take the trash out with a pole in your hand
Segment 41: 118.6s-121.2s:  I'm a real fucking boss, I work chrome in jail
Segment 42: 121.2s-123.8s:  You probably should catch one by yourself, as niggas gonna tell
Segment 43: 123.8s-126.5s:  I can't put my life in another nigga's hands
Segment 44: 126.5s-129.2s:  I ran my shit up, this is not another nigga Benz
Segment 45: 129.2s-131.7s:  Two months ago, I got a big event
Segment 46: 131.7s-134.6s:  And while I hit, I got 300 racks that I can't fucking spend
Segment 47: 134.6s-137.2s:  Solid ass nigga, not gon' fucking bend
Segment 48: 137.2s-139.9s:  Not gon' fucking fold, I knew my cousin told
Segment 49: 139.9s-142.5s:  We was not at K&J, we at the other stuff
Segment 50: 142.5s-145.2s:  You ain't tryna chop shit up, what you got cutter for?
Segment 51: 145.2s-147.8s:  I hate the number four, I hate the fucking snow
Segment 52: 147.8s-150.4s:  Swear to God, I hate my baby mama, but I love her though
Segment 53: 150.4s-153.5s:  That's how I found out, you gotta have love to be a hater
Segment 54: 153.5s-155.9s:  They really love us, but they hatin' cause of our situation
Segment 55: 155.9s-158.5s:  They hit him with some big shit and change his pigmentation
Segment 56: 158.5s-161.3s:  We threw a nuclear bomb on that shit, he died from radiation

TASK: Select between 15-20 scenes from these lyrics that would make the most compelling music video. Use your discretion to choose the optimal number of scenes based on the song content. Each scene should be 5-10 seconds long.

COVERAGE REQUIREMENT: Ensure 100% coverage of the song timeline. When one scene's end_time finishes, the next scene's start_time should begin immediately with NO GAPS. The scenes must cover the entire song from start to finish without skipping any content.

SELECTION CRITERIA:
- Visual storytelling potential (1-10)
- Emotional impact and energy level (1-10)
- Narrative importance to the song (1-10)
- Variety in mood and energy across scenes
- Cinematic appeal and imagery potential
- Complete timeline coverage (no gaps between scenes)

OUTPUT FORMAT (valid JSON only):
{
  "song_themes": ["theme1", "theme2", "theme3"],
  "energy_arc": "description of song's energy progression",
  "total_scenes_selected": 18,
  "average_scene_length": 7.5,
  "selected_scenes": [
    {
      "scene_id": 1,
      "title": "Scene title",
      "start_time": 12.5,
      "end_time": 20.0,
      "duration": 7.5,
      "source_segments": [3, 4],
      "lyrics_excerpt": "Combined lyrics text",
      "theme": "Scene theme/mood",
      "energy_level": 7,
      "visual_potential": 9,
      "narrative_importance": 8,
      "reasoning": "Why this scene was selected"
    }
  ],
  "reasoning_summary": "Overall selection strategy explanation"
}

Respond with only valid JSON.
